Introducing Hangman, the ultimate extension to spice up your new tab experience! Say goodbye to boredom and hello to endless fun with our classic Hangman game integrated right into your browser's new tab page. Each time you open a new tab, challenge yourself to guess the hidden word and save the stick figure from peril. Hangman offers a delightful way to exercise your brain and unwind during your browsing sessions. Transform your mundane new tab into a thrilling gaming arena with Hangman.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Hangman extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to that provided by the service. The search will be powered by Yahoo.
